logs.msg:
Investigated Gemini OAuth 404 error. Found root cause: using Antigravity credentials/format instead of Gemini CLI. Key findings from gemini-cli source:
- Endpoint: cloudcode-pa.googleapis.com/v1internal (same as ours - correct)
- OAuth Client ID: 681255809395-oo8ft2oprdrnp9e3aqf6av3hmdib135j.apps.googleusercontent.com
- OAuth Secret: (see src/auth/google.rs)
- Scopes: cloud-platform, userinfo.email, userinfo.profile
- Model format: NO 'models/' prefix (we incorrectly add it)
- Request uses user_prompt_id not userAgent/requestId
Fix: Update src/auth/google.rs credentials and src/provider/subscription/gemini.rs request format

Gemini OAuth WORKING. Fixed: credentials (Gemini CLI), model format (no models/ prefix), request fields (user_prompt_id), SSE parsing (multi-line data buffering). Also fixed screen clear on selector exit.
